Other Information.Additional Info: Exhibits type I isotherm characteristic of microporous materials.
Does not adsorb N2 due to larger kinetic diameter and smaller quadrupolar moment.

Sieving Mechanism: Size-selective sieving between CO2 and N2

Experimental Validation.Method: Gas sorption studies (CO2 and N2 adsorption)
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2/N2 selectivity: Extraordinarily high (exact value not reported)

Other Information.Additional Info: Material exhibits thermal and air/moisture stability suitable for gas sorption studies. Surface area calculated to be 186 m²/g by Langmuir fitting.
